name: Asteroid (Blujuce)
description:
An old game with a new feel, AsteroidRun brings all the action from the Atari classic, with a new feel 16-bit feel! Fight against many space warriors for the highest score that you can keep track of in the comments by sending in a screenshot of your final score! of fight your family and friends at home over who has the best space skills!

You can also use a Controller or the Keyboard!

AsteroidRun is a game with an interesting idea behind it that I'm considering making into a fullscale game, beyond the classic asteroid game we know and love.

Ideas include but are not limited to:

- A small 2 Player Co-op Campaign explaining the backstory of asteroids!

-A 4 Player LAN Battle Royal for some awesome Couch and Freindship destroying fun!

-An Actual HighScore Table!

Support your space buddies with a buck or two!

have any questions? concerns? complaints? let me know!! 

WillMarda@outlook.com
